name: 游文雄
objective: 機器人學概述、機器人運動學、路徑規劃、機器人避障、機器人視覺、任務規劃、機器人動力學與控制系統
schedule: 1.Robot systems, position, orientation, 2.Homogeneous transforations, 3.Position analysis of serial manipulators, 4.Link parameters, coordinate systems, 5.Loop closure equations, 6.Denavit-Hartenberg method, 8.Successive screw displacement, 9.Position analysis of parallel manipulators, 10.Position analysis of parallel manipulators, 11.Geometric methods, 12.Spartial orientation, 13.Jacobian analysis of serial manipulators, 14.Condition numbers, singularity
scorePolicy:
作業 50%
期中考試 20%
期末考試 30%
